file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-11-06-04 - CHART HOLDER LAMPS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CHART HOLDER LAMPS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the pilot and copilot chart holder lamps. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 33-11-06-000-801-A CHART HOLDER LAMPS - REMOVAL ALL 33-11-06-400-801-A CHART HOLDER LAMPS - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-11-06 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-11-06-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. CHART HOLDER LAMPS - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives procedures to remove the pilot and copilot chart holder lamps. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the READING LIGHT circuit breaker and attach DO- NOT-CLOSE tag to it. I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Lift the letdown chart holder assembly (4). (2) Loosen the screws (1) and washers (2) that attach the lighting assembly (3) to the letdown chart holder assembly (4). (3) Carefully release the lighting assembly. (4) Hold the lighting assembly in the position of the lamp that you will replace. (5) Carefully remove the lamp (5) from the lighting assembly (3). (6) Carefully remove the filter (6) from the lamp (5). NOTE: If the filter is not damaged after you removed it, you can use the filter again. (7) Discard the lamp. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-11-06 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Chart Holder Lamps - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A B DET. A 4. LET DOWN CHART HOLD ASSY 2. WASHER (2) 3. LIGHTING ASSY 1. SCREW (2) C 5. LAMP 6. FILTER 5. LAMP DET. B DET. C 145AMM330342.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-11-06 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-11-06-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. CHART HOLDER LAMPS - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives procedures to install the pilot and copilot chart holder lamps. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 33-11-00-700-801-A/500 COCKPIT LIGHTS - OPERATIONAL TEST IPC 25-10-02 LETDOWN CHART HOLDER C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) Filter IPC 25-10-02 1 H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the filter (6) at the lamp (5). (2) Hold the lighting assembly in the position of the lamp that you will install. (3) Carefully Connect the lamp (5) to the lighting assembly (3). (4) Put the lighting assembly in its correct position and tighten the screws (1) with the washers (2) to install it in the letdown chart holder assembly (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-11-06 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the READING LIGHT circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. (2) Do the operational test of the chart holder ( AMM TASK 33-11-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-11-06 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
